document.full_text: lloyds  took a 3.2 billion pound ($5.3 billion) charge on thursday to compensate consumers who were over-charged on insurance policies, and ireland's economic woes heaped further pain on the british bank.
document.title: lloyds takes $5.3 billion hit for insurance mis-selling
